    • Method Detail

      • getElements

        public static java.util.Set<java.io.File> getElements(java.io.File directory)
        Gets all the elements within desired directory, including the files within the sub-directories of the desired directory.

        Parameters:
        directory - Desired directory
        Returns:
        All the elements within the directory and its sub-directories

      • getLength

        public static long getLength(java.io.File directory)
        Gets the length of the provided directory. The returned value represents the sum of the lengths of all the elements within the desired directory.

        Also if the provided File is a file (File.isFile()), then the returned value will be the length the that file.

        Parameters:
        directory - Desired directory
        Returns:
        Sum of the sum of the lengths of all the elements within the directory
